original_text: And he shall set engines of war against thy walls, and with his axes he shall break down thy towers.
korean_text: 공성퇴를 가지고 네 성을 치며 도끼로 망대를 찍을 것이며

sentences.original_text: And he shall set engines of war against thy walls
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 네 성벽에 망대를 세울 것이며

sentences.original_text: and with his axes he shall break down thy towers
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 도끼로 네 망대를 부술 것이다
